overview: The most elite of the Lucas Men are ready to “Wear” each other “Out” in the bedroom after their long day at the office is finally over. The powerful and influential D.O. sneaks away for a cigarette and secret fuck with the new office hotshot, Edji Da Silva. Hans Berlin strips off his suit for his superior, Jessy Ares. What begins as a normal coffee run ends with Luke Milan sucking and getting fucked by his boss, Charlie Harding. Rod Daily and Mathew Mason take advantage of their status and have hot man sex in the office. And Sebastian Rossi ensures that Tyler Wolf earns every penny of his promotion. The sexiest executives in the corporate world waste no time “Wearing” each other “Out”!
title: Gentlemen 06: Wear Me Out
